articles.title: US urges South Korea not to fill China shortfalls if Beijing bans Micron chips - Financial Times
articles.description: White House has tried to enlist Samsung Electronics and SK Hynix in its semiconductor battle with Beijing
articles.content: The White House has asked South Korea to urge its chipmakers not to fill any market gap in China if Beijing bans Idaho-based Micron from selling chips, as it tries to rally allies to counter Chinese … [+5290 chars]

articles.author: Melissa Koenig
articles.title: Shocking images show Elon Musk's doomed Starship rocket spray debris over Texas coast - Daily Mail
articles.description: Footage from SpaceX's doomed Starship rocket launch on Thursday shows a dust cloud slowly engulfing the area, sending debris flying and palm trees swaying.
articles.content:
Shocking videos posted online show Elon Musk's Starship rocket spraying debris all over the southern Texas coast as it powered off the launchpad.
The massive 395-foot rocket powered into the air fro… [+5914 chars]

articles.title: Queen Mary 2 voyage cancelled due to technical issue - BBC
articles.description: The ocean liner, flagship of the Cunard line, was due to depart Southampton for New York.
articles.content:
About 2,000 Queen Mary 2 passengers have had their voyage cancelled due to a technical issue.
